review: Other than the occasional missing images in the feed while browsing, the Fire TV is an amazing little streaming device, and a must for any Prime Member.I'm not new to the streaming world, and have bought and tested almost every streaming device imaginable, back to the very first Roku before anyone ever knew what Roku was. The Amazon Fire TV holds its own with the best of them.For gamers, the Amazon Fire Controller is a must have accessory and adds even more value to the Fire TV. Gaming works great on it, but the storage limitation causes a few issues,  especially for those who want to play some Grand Theft Auto on their new device.Overall, the Fire TV is off to a great start, and will only get better with time as improvements are made.
